content:
/>
X.i.5.B.5.f
.
Notifying the Claimant of MIB Records
If all other development actions have failed to produce records in support of the claim, deny entitlement and send a decision notice to the claimant that
incorporates the language of
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 5.B.8
, and
advises the claimant of the option to seek decision review under
38 CFR 3.2500
if the MIB search proves successful.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section B - Obtaining Merchant Marine Service Records
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section B
